projectText1.title: adanima: designing advertisments with artificial intelligence
projectText1.description: Adanima is a startup that uses artificial intelligence to design advertisments. I was responsible for the design of the website and the design of the logo.

projectText2.title: Vav Auto: management of orders for an auto parts supplier
projectText2.description: Vav Auto is an auto parts supplier that manages orders using an application that I fully designed. The application is built using SvelteKit. The application is currently in production.
